level.heading: CLASSIFICATIONS AND DISCIPLINES OF ENGINEERING AND LAND SURVEYING (ยง 17-1512)

level.text: An engineering applicant shall be licensed under one of the following classifications:
Engineer Intern – by graduation and examination; or
Professional Engineer – by graduation, experience, and examination after having been licensed as an Engineer Intern, or by reciprocity or endorsement.
Professional Engineers may be licensed in one or more of the following engineering disciplines;

Professional Engineers may be licensed in a discipline not listed in (c) above if an engineering examination for that discipline has been prepared and furnished by the National Council of Examiners for Engineering and Surveying, and the applicant meets the requirements of the District of Columbia for licensure as an engineer.
A land surveying applicant shall be licensed under one of the following classifications:
Land Surveyor Intern – by education and experience; or
Professional Land Surveyor – by experience and examination after having been licensed as a Land Surveyor Intern or by reciprocity or endorsement and examination.
